title: President approves appointment of Ashtar Ausaf Ali as Attorney General for Pakistan
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 9 (APP): President Dr. Arif Alvi on Monday gave approval to the appointment of Ashtar Ausaf Ali as Attorney General for Pakistan.
According to a statement issued by the Presidentâ€™s Office, the President appointed the Attorney General on the advice of the Prime Minister under Article 100 (1) of the Constitution.
The post of Attorney General for Pakistan had become vacant after the resignation of Khalid Javed Khan.
